REASONING: Multiple official sources confirm that Chinatown MRT station is located on the North East Line (purple) and Downtown Line (blue), not on the green line
The official LTA website states 'Chinatown MRT Station (NE4/DT19) is located on the North East Line and Downtown Line'
SBS Transit's official website confirms 'Chinatown Station (NE4) operates on the North East (NE) Line' with 'purple line branding' and connects to 'Downtown Line (DT19)' with 'blue line branding'

The Traveloka travel guide clearly identifies the line colors: 'East West Line (EWL) - Green' and 'North East Line (NEL) - Purple', confirming that the green line is the East West Line, not where Chinatown station is located

One suspicious result claiming Chinatown was moved to the green line appears to be from a fake/phishing website (lta-gov-sg.to) trying to trick users into downloading malicious software, not the legitimate LTA website
The legitimate LTA website domain is lta.gov.sg, while the fake site uses lta-gov-sg.to with suspicious executable downloads
